label: SustainabilityInspection
comment: The process of performing documented checks of sustainability characteristics, with a focus on discovering deviations, related to documented sustainability requirements.

datatypeProperties.comment: A specified inspection result applicable to this sustainability characteristic.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.
The inspector executing this specified inspection.
The indication of whether or not this specified inspection is outsourced.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A specified inspection event for this sustainability inspection.
The inspection status specified for this sustainability inspection.

referencedBy.comment: A sustainability inspection applicable to this logistics transport movement.
